q1.question: How is my data protected?
q1.answer: Your data is encrypted with the AES-256 standard and stored on GDPR-compliant European servers.

q2.question: Can I export my memories?
q2.answer: Yes, you can export your capsules as PDF or download all your media at any time.

q3.question: How does posthumous legacy work?
q3.answer: You designate trusted guardians who will be able to access your capsules according to the conditions you define.

q4.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
q4.answer: Yes, you can cancel at any time. Your data remains accessible and exportable.
